Heart: Decided decrease in pulse rate with anxiety and apprehensiveness
Eyes: Dull, heavy; pupils contracted; eyeballs feel contracted; aching in and around eyes
Respiratory: Pain in chest, extending to head
Hoarseness; constant desire to clear throat
Chest oppressed; dry, hacking cough coming on at night and keeping one awake
Must rise at night to urinate
Head: Bursting pain, beginning in occiput and spreading all over
Whole head and scalp feels sore, bruised, after pain has ceased
Nose: Itching in anterior chamber; worse, breathing any dust; better, indoors
Profuse, watery coryza; drops down throat
Extremities: Pain deep in middle of right arm
SHARP PAIN IN RIGHT DELTOID AND PECTORALIS MUSCLES
Rheumatic pain in right elbow and wrist, and hands of both sides

name: Solanum lycopersicum
Relationship: Compare: BELL. (follows well); EUP. PERF.; RHUS; SANGUIN.; CAPS.
details: Marked symptoms of rheumatism and influenza. Severe aching pains all over body. PAINS LEFT AFTER INFLUENZA. Head always shows signs of acute congestion. Hay-fever, with marked aggravation from breathing the least dust. Frequent urination and profuse watery diarrhoea.
